remarks: Conditions for two walks within the same undirected simple graph being the same.  It is sufficient that the vertices (in the same order) are identical.  (Contributed by AV, 3-Jul-2018.)
statement:
usg2wlkeq $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( A e. ( V Walks E ) /\ B e. ( V Walks E ) ) /\ N = ( # ` ( 1st ` A ) ) ) -> ( A = B <-> ( N = ( # ` ( 1st ` B ) ) /\ A. y e. ( 0 ... N ) ( ( 2nd ` A ) ` y ) = ( ( 2nd ` B ) ` y ) ) ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d E y $.
$d N y $.
$d V y $.
